description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync P703 PG - 70" LED-backlit LCD Flat Panel Display
The MultiSync P703 PG with protection glass follows the tradition of NEC's professional large format display line. The high quality Conturan glass of Schott ensures reduced reflection and high light transmission for an unrestricted view of display content. Designed for a wide array of applications such as retail signage including 24/7, transport, corporate or control room P series with protection glass offers flexible installation combined with industry leading performance.
dimensions wxdxh: 158.7 cm x 9.62 cm x 91.96 cm - without stand
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), anti-reflection coating, Eco Mode, temperature sensor, protection glass, Open Pluggable Specification slot, built-in NFC sensor, 5mm Conturan glass by Schott
